showScoreExcerpt: "The design team has created a magical space...Compelling storytelling...thrillingly inventive staging...For all its magic and mayhem, at the heart of the play lie universal themes of friendship, loyalty, trust and the old truism that history has a habit of repeating itself...A fast-paced Rubik's cube type affair with the kind of reveals that make Potter aficionados gasp out loud...A play with great heart and many lessons to teach."
